definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: The settlements layout mode is the mid-scopic field in the research of architectural culture of traditional settlements.
sentences.chinese: 聚落布局模式是传统聚落建筑文化研究的中观层次。

sentences.english: The settlements layout mode is the mid-scopic field in the research of architectural culture of traditional settlements.
sentences.chinese: 聚落布局模式是传统聚落建筑文化研究的中观层次。

sentences.english: Finally some opinions on landscape evalution and plannings were p…
sentences.chinese: 进而提出了有关聚落建筑景观评价和规划的建议。

sentences.english: The development of the rural settlements was the result of the changes of the effect factors.
sentences.chinese: 乡村聚落的发展是由其影响因素的变迁造成的。

sentences.english: In addition, the abundant aquatic resources and mineral resources supported some fishing or mining settlements.
sentences.chinese: 丰富的水产资源和矿产资源，使专业性聚落应运而生。

sentences.english: In short, researches about settlements in the Northern Shanxi still occupied the initial stage.
sentences.chinese: 总之，晋北聚落的研究尚处在初级阶段。

sentences.english: The Irish remained in small bands during the early Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 在中古时代初期，爱尔兰人只剩下少数的聚落。

sentences.english: And many rural settlements are cut off from electricity producing centers.
sentences.chinese: 并且，发电中心切断了许多乡村聚落的电力。

sentences.english: Village is the origin of human settlement.
sentences.chinese: 村落是人类聚落的起点。

sentences.english: It is hard to fight an enemy who has outposts in your head.
sentences.chinese: 聚落在你的头里的敌人很难以搏斗。

sentences.english: Now this area preserves various traditional residences and settlements with distinctive characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 本地区现保存着多种各具特色的传统住屋和聚落。

sentences.english: The object of the Picture is the settlement of the Tianjingguan Village of Zezhou county in Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 本文以山西省泽州县天井关聚落为研究对象。

sentences.english: Ancient post village is a kind of unique compact community.
sentences.chinese: 古邮驿聚落是一种独具特色的聚居形式。

sentences.english: The formation of certain clan accompanies with the process in which the settlement of Sanxi shaped as a spatial entity.
sentences.chinese: 宗族的形成与三溪作为空间聚落的形成过程彼此一致。

sentences.english: Finally, it gives a brief report on the future trends of rural settlement research in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 最后，并简述德国鄕聚落学未来发展的趋向。

sentences.english: The impacts of being resettled on a community are enormous.
sentences.chinese: 聚落搬迁是很大的冲击。

definition: to inhabit a region (esp. ethnic group)/to congregate
Liangzhu (c. 3400-2250 BC), neolithic culture of Changjiang delta
